thread.title: Mikkel Boedker has hat trick, Coyotes beat Senators 4-1
thread.title_full: Mikkel Boedker has hat trick, Coyotes beat Senators 4-1

author: senh
title: Mikkel Boedker has hat trick, Coyotes beat Senators 4-1
text: BING NEWS: Hockey: Mikkel Boedker has hat trick, Coyotes beat Senators 4-1 OTTAWA, Ontario (AP) - Mikkel Boedker was happier to see the Arizona Coyotes snap their losing streak than score a hat trick. Boedker scored three goals and the Coyotes beat the Ottawa Senators 4-1 on Saturday night to end the skid at four games. 10/24/2015 - 8:50 pm | View Link Boedker has hat trick, Coyotes beat Senators to snap skid Boedker scored three goals and the Coyotes beat the Ottawa Senators 4-1 on Saturday night to end the skid at four games. ''That was real important, especially on a longer road trip,'' Boedker said. ''We still have two more games on this road trip so I ... 10/24/2015 - 6:17 pm | View Link Mikkel Boedker Has Hat Trick, Coyotes Beat Senators 4-1 Mikkel Boedker scored three goals and the Arizona Coyotes beat the Ottawa Senators 4-1 on Saturday night to snap a four-game losing streak. Brad Richardson also scored, and Anders Lindback made 35 saves in his first start of the season to help Arizona ... 10/24/2015 - 3:23 pm | View Link Mikkel Boedker scores hat trick to lead Arizona Coyotes past Edmonton Oilers Mikkel Boedker scores hat trick to lead Arizona Coyotes past Edmonton Oilers Winger Mikkel Boedker scored his first career hat trick and added an assist with his second goal in the third standing up as the game-winner in a period that saw the Oilers try to ... 10/17/2014 - 2:57 am | View Link Mikkel Boedker nets hat trick as Coyotes beat Oilers Mikkel Boedker scored on a power play, a soft backhander that trickled in and into an empty net. An interesting collection of goals for his first career hat trick â€” and his team needed nearly all of them. Boedker scored two of his three goals in the ...
